divs: Sighting DetailsWhat was seen was a fireball shape glare with no after math or sound what so ever and the object was moving very slowly it has been spotted more then just once My mother Bonnie Lee Wright and 8 other wittiness had seen the thing fly right over there head at her Job and when she came home she had drawn the object on paper! it also changed form from a ball shape to a long shape cigar please if anyone else seen this same object let's bring it in to the light If you need to contact Bonnie Wright her email address is Bonnie5673@msn.com thank you
